name: Solo Journey
description:
For being blamed on the emperors disappearance, you have been exiled from the kingdom.

The citizens give you an opportunity to redeem yourself if you are able to defeat the boss that's been sending monsters to terrorize the surrounding areas.

And so begins your solo journey...

 Combat / Tips:

-  Damage dealt is simply the difference between the attack and defense plus a random number between 0 and the attacker's luck. If the defender has more defense, then the damage is between 0 and the attacker's luck.

-  You will always attack first in combat and it will automatically play-out until someone dies.

-  Click on your stat to allocate your available points. This cannot be undone once allocated

-  Click on the items in your inventory to use or equip.

Thank you for playing and I hope you enjoy it!!
